text: Matthew Rhys Evans (born 8 November 1974), known professionally as Matthew Rhys (), is a Welsh actor. He is known for his Emmy-winning role as Philip Jennings on the FX drama series The Americans. Rhys has been in a relationship with his The Americans co-star Keri Russell since 2013. They had their first child, a son named Sam, in late May 2016. ==References== Category:Emmy Award winning actors Category:1974 births Category:Living people Category:Welsh movie actors Category:Welsh television actors Category:Welsh voice actors Category:Welsh stage actors Category:People from Cardiff
title: Matthew Rhys
